headline: Is GE HealthCare Technologies (GEHC) Offering Value After Its Spin Off From General Electric?
summary: If you are wondering whether GE HealthCare Technologies is offering good value today, you are not alone. The stock often draws interest from investors who care about what they are paying for future potential. The share price recently closed at US$83.86, with returns of 4.4% over the past week, 5.1% over the past month, 1.3% year to date, and a 7.2% decline over the past year. This gives a mixed picture for anyone thinking about timing. Recent company news has focused on GE HealthCare...
